original: MÅNSSON, Gustaf Birger, Konsul, Norrköping, f Nrkp 20/4 86 av avd.ch G M o lär:an Augusta Jonson, gm Gurli Janzon. Tjm Nrkp sjöm.h 05—14, tf sjöm.h.omb.m 14—17, anst sed. 05 i sped-, befraktn- o skeppsmäkl.fma Aug V Svenson (etabl 89), vkst dir sed. 14 o num av inneh, edsv skeppsmäkl 20, auktor skeppsklarer 34, vkst dir AB Nrkp godsbil-central. Norsk kons Nrkp, Ögl o Sörml 36. Styr.led hamnstyr, ordf bilvärd.nmdn, komm.-.koll rev f Nrkp sjöm.h, flm o ordf Nrkp ’köpmfrn o Nrkp hdlsfrn, ordf Ögl Fabr & Grossistfrb, Nrkpsavd av Sv Statens försvarslån, Nrkp auto- & flygklubb, Nrkp SS, Frn Sv Flottas lokalavd, Cykelfrämj Nrkpavd, Sv segl.sk :s lokalkomm, Kopparbo vägfrn, styr.led Sv skeppsklarer- o skeppsmäkl.frn, KSAK, KAK Idsfrn, Sv Norgehj :s Nrkpkomm, org.-komm f insaml t Nrkp försvar. Rest i flert europ länd. RNO, RVO, FinlVRO, FinlKrg-MM, ProPGM, idrm g, Nrkp SS GM, Nrkp Auto- & Flygklb ftjt g o gplak, KAK Idsfrns gplak. Hobbies: Idrott, gymn, sport, segling, flygning, schack, tennis.
translated: MÅNSSON, Gustaf Birger, Consul, Norrköping, born in Norrköping on April 20th, 1886, son of division chief G M and teacher Augusta Jonson, married to Gurli Janzon. Employed at Norrköping shipping company from 1905 to 1914, acting shipping company manager from 1914 to 1917, employed since 1905 in forwarding, chartering, and shipbroking firm Aug V Svenson (established 1889), appointed managing director in 1914 and became a partner in 1920, authorized ship agent in 1934, managing director of AB Norrköping Goods Transport Center. Norwegian Consul in Norrköping, Östergötland, and Södermanland in 1936. Board member of the harbor board, chairman of the vehicle registration committee, member of the naval control board in Norrköping, member and chairman of Norrköping merchants association and Norrköping Chamber of Commerce, chairman of Östergötland Manufacturers and Wholesalers Association, Norrköping division of the Swedish State Defense Loan, Norrköping automobile and aviation club, Norrköping Social Democrats, Local division of the Swedish Navy Association, Norrköping division of the Bicycle Promotion Society, local committee of the Swedish Sailing Association, board member of the Swedish ship agents and shipbrokers association, Royal Swedish Aero Club, Royal Automobile Club, and Swedish Norway Aid Committee in Norrköping, organizing committee for fundraising for the defense of Norrköping. Traveled extensively in several European countries. Recipient of the Order of the Northern Star, Order of Vasa, Order of the White Rose of Finland, Finnish War memorial medal, Pro Patria Gold Medal, honorary member of Norrköping Social Democrats, Norrköping Automobile and Aviation Club gold diploma, Royal Automobile Club's honorary diploma. Hobbies: sports, gymnastics, sailing, flying, chess, tennis.

employment.name: Forwarding, Chartering, and Shipbroking Firm Aug V Svenson

honors.name: Order of the White Rose of Finland
